donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The Project is formulated to: a) Support the process of introducing or strengthening innovative justice instruments (such as alternatives to imprisonment, existing Palaces of Justice and free legal aid); b) Increase vulnerable group's awareness on human rights and justice services and c) Support the establishment of the National Commission on Human Rights.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
- Legal Framework related to the National Crime Observatory finalized
- National Crime Observatory made operational  
- Officials of the Crime Observatory Capacitated 
-Transparency in the work of the National Crime Observatory ensured

project_descr: Strengthening access to justice, rule of law and human rights protection in Mozambique
project_title: Strengthen Access to Justice, Rule of Law & Human Rights
